title: United States : retail e-commerce sales 2017 to 2024
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 8 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2022, and lastly roughly constant from 2022 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 599186.0 was reported at Year 2024
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 274755.0 was reported at Year 2017
